channel.title: Someone help me?
channel.description:
I Download " EasyRSC " and i wanna put my own server up... i wanna put my server only online in my own local host... but i dont have router, i have the Cable Modem.. (Motorola SB5101E) i need the portforward... my "compile " dont work.. " look more what RedSinR said. --> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,457685.msg3349565.html LATEST MASSAGE
Sorry if my engish is bad... :S
Thanks!

item.title: Someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @dedblu2005 dedblu2005@hotmail.com
item.description:
@dedblu2005 wrote:

http://www.amazon.co.uk/Linksys-WRT54GL-Wireless-G-Broadband-Router/dp/B000ETX928/ref=sr_1_7?s=computers&ie=UTF8&qid=1285487843&sr=1-7

you have jdk, and i set up your environmental variables for java and ant and you still cant compile. so the way i see it you have 4 options.

  1. buy a router get some one to configure and compile your server and client for you (ill even do it for you)(but you will never be able to edit it in any way)

2.buy a router get some one to help you set up your pc to compile then get me (or some one else) to configure it for you

3.get some one else to host it for you, that dose not care if there bandwidth is wasted

4.play on someone’s server that allrdy has it all set up (like me) and follow all there rules

i would pick option 2 but thats me

Read full topic

item.title: Someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @deadheart deadheart
item.description:
@deadheart wrote:

Why would you want to play single player RSC anyway? It defeats the purpose of an MMO… I mean, right now my server is only hosted to me but that’s for testing purposes before I decide to take it live (Maps aren’t working very well… :()

Read full topic

item.title: Someone help me?
item.dc:creator: @bamboozola bamboozola
item.description:
@bamboozola wrote:

Port forward then put your modem ip in server.java if your doing it for yourself then just put localhost in server.java

Read full topic
